biocontainers.name: damageprofiler
biocontainers.summary: A java based tool to determine damage patterns on ancient dna as a replacement for mapdamage

biotools.summary: DamageProfiler calculates damage profiles of mapped reads and provides a graphical as well as text based representation.

bioschemas.name: DamageProfiler
bioschemas.summary: DamageProfiler calculates damage profiles of mapped reads and provides a graphical as well as text based representation.
